channel.title: Bootstrapped.fm #110: “Living the Bootstrapper dream” with Robin Warren, founder of Corrello
channel.description:
@robinwarren and I discuss living the Bootstrapper dream – and how the dream changes over time. We also go off topic and discuss surfing up the Bristol Channel.
[Listen to the episode here](https://bootstrapped.fm/2019/10/11/110-living-the-bootstrapper-dream-with-robin-warren-founder-of-corrello/).

item.title: Bootstrapped.fm #110: “Living the Bootstrapper dream” with Robin Warren, founder of Corrello
item.dc:creator: unboot
item.description:
Robin also did an earlier episode on Britstrapped: http://www.britstrapped.com/dcaf15c5
This episode was a good inspiration and made me look into other markets.

Read full topic
